description:
The Seirin High School basketball team is practicing hard in preparation for their full-scale war on the Generation of Miracles at the Winter Cup. On one of their days off, Kuroko and his friends decide to participate in a street ball tournament where they encounter Kagami`s friend from America, Himuro Tatsuya.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Never Thought We`d Meet Here
Konna Tokoro de Au to wa na
こんな所で会うとはな
